name: Worlds Worst Ninja
description:
The game is a subversion of traditional stealth games such as Mark of the Ninja by mixing it with physics-based shooters such as Broforce. You play as the Worlds Worst Ninja, who instead of using traditional ninja weapons, use the likes of assault rifles and grenade launchers to “stealthily '' kill their enemies.
